channel.title: 3 simple questions
channel.description:
Q1 does anyone hast the ice barrage actualy hits several persons at 1 time working or is ther only one that hits 1 lplayer at the time
Q2
can anyone explain to me how i should find the interfaces myself isntead of a full list.
Q3
should i do this the same with the cases?
are these located in the client?
do i need to use an hex program for that wich one should i use then
and how do i use it then.. im not got with hex if tryed before-.-

item.title: 3 simple questions
item.dc:creator: @wicked_destiny wicked destiny
item.description:
@wicked_destiny wrote:

[quote=“thiefmn6092, post:2, topic:99296”][quote author=wicked destiny link=topic=142623.msg1364789#msg1364789 date=1179970048]
Q1
does anyone hast the ice barrage actualy hits several persons at 1 time
working or is ther only one that hits 1 lplayer at the time

u mean that they i should look into the client ?

Q2

can anyone explain to me how i should find the interfaces myself isntead of a full list.

Q3

should i do this the same with the cases?

are these located in the client?

do i need to use an hex program for that
wich one should i use then

and how do i use it then…
im not got with hex if tryed before-.-

[/quote]

Q2 Answer: I know what class stores packet structure data in the runescape 2 client, but look through them all and look for something similar to what the server stream class looks like except a bit more complicated. :-)[/quote]

Read full topic

item.title: 3 simple questions
item.dc:creator: @thiefmn6092 thiefmn6092
item.description:
@thiefmn6092 wrote:

[quote=“wicked destiny, post:1, topic:99296”]Q1
does anyone hast the ice barrage actualy hits several persons at 1 time
working or is ther only one that hits 1 lplayer at the time

Q2

can anyone explain to me how i should find the interfaces myself isntead of a full list.

Q3

should i do this the same with the cases?

are these located in the client?

do i need to use an hex program for that
wich one should i use then

and how do i use it then…
im not got with hex if tryed before-.-[/quote]

Q2 Answer: I know what class stores packet structure data in the runescape 2 client, but look through them all and look for something similar to what the server stream class looks like except a bit more complicated.

Read full topic
